item.title: Vidya sparks pregnancy rumours again after she walks out of Sujoy Ghoshs next
item.description: Actor Vidya Balan who bagged multiple awards for her role in Sujoy Ghoshs 2012 hit Kahaani has walked out of his upcoming project at the last minute citing health issues
item.itunes:subtitle: Actor Vidya Balan who bagged multiple awards for her role in Sujoy Ghoshs 2012 hit Kahaani has walked out of his upcoming project at the last minute citing health issues
item.itunes:summary: Actor Vidya Balan who bagged multiple awards for her role in Sujoy Ghoshs 2012 hit Kahaani has walked out of his upcoming project at the last minute citing health issues

item.title: We do not celebrate Holi Amitabh Bachchan
item.description: Bollywood superstar Amitabh Bachchan says that this year Holi has coincided with his daughter Shweta Nandas 40th birthday and he is spending the day with her

item.title: Wont mind locking lips if story demands Lakshmi Menon
item.description: Southern actress Lakshmi Menon who locked lips with Vishal Krishna for upcoming Tamil actioner Naan Sigappu Manithan doesnt mind onscreen kissing as long as it is vital to the script
item.itunes:subtitle: Southern actress Lakshmi Menon who locked lips with Vishal Krishna for upcoming Tamil actioner Naan Sigappu Manithan doesnt mind onscreen kissing as long as it is vital to the script

item.title: Johnny Depps thinking about early retirement
item.description: Actor Johnny Depp recently turned 50 and says that he doesnt see himself continuing acting in the future The actor will be seen next in Transcendence

item.itunes:summary: Actor Johnny Depp recently turned 50 and says that he doesnt see himself continuing acting in the future The actor will be seen next in Transcendence

item.title: People dont just criticise your work they criticise you Harman Baweja
item.description: Actor Harman Baweja has resurfaced after five years to rebuild his dwindling career with Dishkiyaoon Talking candidly about the wrong choices he made he said one should take criticism in the right spirit and move on
item.itunes:subtitle: Actor Harman Baweja has resurfaced after five years to rebuild his dwindling career with Dishkiyaoon Talking candidly about the wrong choices he made he said one should take criticism in the right spirit and move on

item.title: Raja Rani dubbed Telugu version a hit
item.description: The dubbed Telugu version of the hit Tamil romanticdrama Raja Rani raked in Rs201 crore in its opening weekend Trade analyst Trinath calls it an exceptional start for a dubbed movie

item.title: Abhishek also injured while shooting for Happy New Year
item.description: Now Abhishek Bachchan has hurt his right wrist while shooting for the same film But the actor continues to keep his commitments The actor will also resume his shooting schedule today

item.title: Get ready for item numbers by Salman Akshay Kareena
item.description: A bevy of upcoming films will see Alist stars grooving to the peppy beats of item numbers Right from Salman Khan and Akshay Kumar to Kareena Kapoor Khan and Shilpa Shetty everyones gearing up for a dance number this year Heres a lowdown

item.title: I am glad I gave work to other people Kareena on rejecting Queen Ramleela
item.description: When asked about her refusal to projects like Queen RamLeela Chennai Express Fashion Kal Ho Na Ho Black and others which subsequently went to other actresses Kareena said she did not regret her decision

item.title: Gul Panag will make a good leader Purab Kohli
item.description: Describing close friend and actress Gul Panag as sensible and smart Bollywood actor Purab Kohli Monday said he would be happy to support the Aam Aadmi Party AAP candidate from Chandigarh for the Lok Sabha polls
item.itunes:subtitle: Describing close friend and actress Gul Panag as sensible and smart Bollywood actor Purab Kohli Monday said he would be happy to support the Aam Aadmi Party AAP candidate from Chandigarh for the Lok Sabha polls

item.title: Priyankas cousin Meera wants to play a baddie

item.title: I was born on Holi says Aamir Khan
item.description: In an exclusive Holi shoot with Hindustan Times Aamir Khan his wife Kiran Rao and son Azad had a ball playing with colours The actor also revealed he was born on Holi and a nurse smeared gulaal on his cheek right after his birth

item.title: Bollywood actors share their craziest and funniest memories of Holi
item.description: Raveena Tandon couldnt stop laughing till 6 in the evening after having thandai for the first time Richa Chadda took a shower for three hours after eating a bhang ka laddoo We asked some Bollywood actors to share their most amusing memories of the festival

item.title: This Canadian singer is a fan of Daler Mehndi

item.title: With Samvidhaan Shyam Benegal rediscovers India for Indians
item.description: Samvidhaan The Making of the Constitution of India isnbspminiseries about how hundreds of Indians with diverse backgroundsnbspconvened in the Central Hall of the Parliament day after day to debate over exactly how to frame the identity of the newly independent India

item.title: Celebs turn politicians this election season
item.description: With the Lok Sabha polls just around the corner politics seems to be the flavour of the season for celebrities From Mithun Chakraborty and Gul Panag to Baichung Bhutia and Dhanraj Pillay its election time for Bollywood and the sports fraternity

item.title: Movie review 3 Days To Kill seems to last a long time
item.description: Even Kevin Costner as a former CIA agent fails to rescue this one Watch it only if a few wellcaptured car chases and action scenes are enough to satiate you say critics Neither the direction nor the script holds your attention

item.title: Alia Bhatt uploads thank you video to connect with fans
